decolorization result: Visual change from blue to violet
any additional information: Decolorization observed at different dye concentrations led to a plateau at 30 µg/ml.

decolorization result: Significant color change observed on TLC
any additional information: Thin layer chromatography showed degradation products.
Dyes included crystal violet, brilliant green, basic fuchsin, and malachite green.

decolorization result: Rhodococcus erythropolis SQ1 did not decolorize without the clone
any additional information: Clones displayed increased activity in the presence of the heterologous gene.
Dyes like amaranth and orange II were effectively degraded in combination.
